section1.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.text: By downloading or using the Linkzy app, you agree to this End User License Agreement (EULA). This EULA is a legal agreement between you and Linkzy, governing your use of the application.

section2.heading: 2. Age Requirement
section2.text: Linkzy is strictly for users aged 18 and older. By agreeing to this EULA, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old. Users found to be under the age of 18 will have their accounts terminated immediately.

section3.heading: 3. User-Generated Content
section3.text: Linkzy allows users to create, post, and share content. However, you agree not to post any content that is illegal, offensive, discriminatory, harmful, or otherwise objectionable. Linkzy has no tolerance for objectionable content or abusive behavior.

section4.heading: 4. Prohibited Conduct
section4.intro: You may not use the app to:
list: Harass, bully, or abuse other users.
Post or share inappropriate, offensive, or illegal content.
Engage in fraudulent or deceptive practices.
Violate any applicable laws or regulations.

section5.heading: 5. Account Suspension or Termination
section5.text: Linkzy reserves the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate this agreement or participate in abusive or illegal behavior.

section6.heading: 6. No Tolerance for Objectionable Content
section6.intro: There is zero tolerance for any objectionable content, including but not limited to:

section7.heading: 7. Limitation of Liability
section7.text: Linkzy is not responsible for the actions of users on the app. We do our best to moderate and remove inappropriate content, but users engage with the app at their own risk.

section8.heading: 8. Changes to this Agreement
section8.text: Linkzy reserves the right to modify this EULA at any time. Changes will be posted within the app and take effect immediately.
